laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates no focal or textural abnormalities. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Gallbladder is normal without stones or wall edema. Common bile duct normal in caliber measuring 3 mm. Body and head of pancreas unremarkable. Tail of pancreas slightly obscured by overlying bowel gas. No perihepatic ascites. Main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow.
